column5: of algood will be held friday
column6: june 12 at 11 am in the chapel of presley funeral home with bro. jeff cotterman officiating. interment will follow in dodson chapel cemetery in overton county. the family will receive friends thursday 5 pm to 8 pm and friday 9 am until service time at the funeral home. mr. reed passed away tuesday
column8: 2015 at his home. he was born april 19
column10: tn to the late richard and nannie elizabeth sherrill reed. mr. reed was a member of dodson chapel methodist church and was retired from the city of algood with 25 years of service. in addition to his parents
column11: he was preceded in death by three sisters
column13: nell west and ethel houston; and two brothers
column14: joe reed and stancel reed. mr. reed is survived by his wife of 40 years
column15: betty stockton reed of algood; one son
column16: roger dewayne reed and wife samantha of franklin
column18: evangeline reed of franklin; one brother
column19: emmett reed and wife beth of crossville and a brother-in-law
